alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 12:13PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A thunderstorm with gusty winds will impact portions of east central Douglas and northwestern Elbert Counties through 1245 PM MDT... At 1212 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Elbert, or 28 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elbert, Elizabeth, Kiowa and Ponderosa Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet
